Inferior attacks - Have you noticed that some attacks with the same 
character are weaker than than the basic attack?  What I am talking 
about is the mage's attacks.  I can kill an opponent with less energy 
using the basic basic than either "Energy wave" or "Heartburst".  Has 
anyone else noticed that?

Scenarios - I'm working on "The Tunneled Labryinth".  Don't worry, I 
plan on it taking about 30 minutes for a player to beat it, assuming 
the player does not get lost.  It will be a teleporter maze with 
towers as opponents.  [Interestinly enough, I hated walking around in 
mazes while playing Doom.]  Then I will try to work on scenarios in my 
set that I just don't have the inspiration for.
